#summary Extensions to jQLite

= A List of Extensions to jQLite =

The following extensions work with jQLite and jQuery.

== Accordian ==

A group of tabs which expand/collapse, either like a radio group, or individually.  You can convert any `UL` element into an accordion by specifying a format like the following:

{{{
   <ul class="tabs">
      <li>
         <div class="title">Tab One</div>
         <div class="body">
            This is the body of tab one.
         </div>
      </li>
      <li>
         <div class="title">Tab Two</div>
         <div class="body">
            This is the body of tab two.
         </div>
      </li>
      <li>
         <div class="title">Tab Three</div>
         <div class="body">
            This is the body of tab three.
         </div>
      </li>
   </ul> 

   <script type="text/javascript">
      $(document).ready(function() {
         $("ul.tabs").jqAccordian({ openOne: false });
      });
   </script>
}}}
